body.p: An entity shall offset an asset relating to one plan against a liability relating to another plan when, and only when, the entity:

li.p: has a legally enforceable right to use a surplus in one plan to settle obligations under the other plan; and
intends either to settle the obligations on a net basis, or to realise the surplus in one plan and settle its obligation under the other plan simultaneously.
